extendedInfo.description: Please consider the Donate to Education Version: Apps for Education Donationread the http://cp2-software.tumblr.com"> Apps for Education storyHave you ever wanted to get into your car and when Bluetooth connects to your phone the music just starts playing where it left off in the player of your choice?This app is designed to tie the Bluetooth connect event to playing the music player of your choice.  Unlike other auto-play options, this allows you to select the specific player that should be used.   Do you want Spotify instead of Google Music Player, you can select that, do you want TuneIn instead of the Core Android music player, no problem.Why would you want this?  Some Bluetooth receivers do not play at all, some target the stock music player, this puts you in control of what happens when Bluetooth audio connects.**Important Note**This App assumes you already have the subject Bluetooth device Paired to your phone using the BT device manufacturer's unique approach.   It won't help Pair the device, the list that shows (as in the App picture) is a list of Paired (sometimes called Bonded) devices.  This App starts a Music App by package name and broadcasts "play" to start the player.  NOT all players support this.  Some players that work:  * Google Play Music  * Core Music Player  * DoubleTwist  * Android Music  * Rocket Player  * iHeart Radio:   Best if you select "Play last station on startup"  * Pandora:   Must select "Bluetooth for Automotive" in settings  * TuneIn:   Best if you select "Auto restart Player"  * Slacker:   Best if you select "Resume Play on Startup"  * Spotify  * Maple MP3 player.   Note: Must set "Respond to Headset Buttons" to ONFor a Bluetooth device to play music, it must support the A2DP standard, otherwise it can't stream music  (http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bluetooth_profile)

reviews.title: Could not find Music Players
reviews.comment: After app was installed, it said \"No Palayers found, try installing a different Player.\"  When I pressed this area, a white screen appeared, and no apps showed up after several minutes.
reviews.author: Matt Shaffer

reviews.title: Amazing and simple!
reviews.comment: Update:5+ stars, amazing support to compliment an amazing app!  Since switching to droid I am discovering what a \'smartER phone\' feels like.  This app along with Llama allows me to get in my car and have the music start playing without the phone ever leaving my pocket!  One note:either this or llama causes my default lock screen to show instead of  widget locker.
reviews.author: Jason Fournier

reviews.title: Did not stream vie Bluetooth
reviews.comment: Music didn\'t play via BT in my 2007 BMW 5 series.. I\'m using Sony xperia IOn phone
reviews.author: Gerrett houston

reviews.title: Great app, generally happy, needs minor enhancements
reviews.comment: I was thrilled to find something that is effective in minimizing my keystrokes when I want to stream audio from my phone. I regularly use Pandora in the car and this works excellently in my VW. As soon as Bluetooth connects, Pandora starts right up.  Before I had to swipe up, unlock w/my PIN, click Pandora, etc.  It\'s seamless now!  Room for improvement (and losing one star): 1. Fails to work for launching Pandora when the car\'s Bluetooth doesn\'t support A2DP. I would like it to work regardless of A2DP beca  EDIT: the updates for A2DP vs. any bluetooth connection  are working great...thanks! Bumping up a star to 5-stars for the enhancement and quick response...thanks!
reviews.author: Matt Brennan

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Have tried so many other apps to make using Bluetooth seamless. This is the only one that got it right. Excellent job guys!
reviews.author: brad haag

reviews.title: This app fills a need!
reviews.comment: Since I use Spotify for the majority of my music listening, this app has been terrific to have. It is exactly what I was looking for, with the exception of a couple minor annoyances, but overall very good.
reviews.author: Curtis Fox

reviews.title: Works Great
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly
reviews.author: Manuel Zamora

reviews.title: Perfect App
reviews.comment: I\'m luvin it. I use juicedefender to auto on my bluetooth when I connect to the charger in my car then Connect and Play will auto play my TuneIn Radio recording.
reviews.author: Mohd Amir Mohd Ali

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Works great to connect and auto play just as named.  I use with a Kinivo btc450 in my car.  Definite thumbs up to the author.  Only criticism is I\'d like the option to disable the icon/notification from the notification tray, if not totally then at least automatically after you\'re no longer connected and actually playing audio/using the app.  I have to swipe it away to clear it...  Be nice to auto close the audio app when it disconnects too,  but maybe too much to ask.
reviews.author: Ray Strietelmeier

reviews.title: Works fine for Google Play Music
reviews.comment: And has only the Bluetooth permission!
reviews.author: Gabriel Casella

reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
reviews.comment: Starts up Google Play Music and begins playing my music as soon as I start my car. Perfect for me.
reviews.author: Martin Newton

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: carl Louie Cebu

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: I use a bluetooth headset on a motorbike so using the phone screen to control anything is both incredibly difficult and dangerous. Until now, if I wanted to listen to music, I had to stop the bike, take off a glove, fiddle with the screen to start my music player, put the glove back on and get going again. Now I just turn on the headset with one finger and the music starts playing. Awesome!
reviews.author: Stuart Travers

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: The only issue I had have been quickly fixed. Great App
reviews.author: Rasmus Eneman

reviews.title: not working...samsung s duos
reviews.comment: I have a samsung s duos gt7562 and bluetooth headset hm1100. It shows that the devices are paired but can\'t hear music through the bluetooth headset. I hope the developer will have a solution for this...
reviews.author: Harshal parab

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Super
reviews.author: Santhosh Kumar

reviews.title: Woont play to car audio
reviews.comment: Wont play to car audio...
reviews.author: Sapan Patel

reviews.title: You are a genius!!! :-D
reviews.comment: This app works excellent :D  I was a bit curious and wanted to try the \'skip\' buttons of my car to operate spotify, something I could only dream of in another app and...  ...it worked !!!  Excellent piece of work mate!!!  Some minor defect maybe: If I turn on bluetooth and sit down in my car spotify get\'s opened but doesn\'t play automaticly, but really a nice piece of software!!!  thanks again,  where can I pay for this?
reviews.author: Sander Theetaert

reviews.title: Just perfect
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t need unnecessary permissions just Bluetooth. That\'s great, this is privacy!  Thank you, developer!!
reviews.author: Tim Otto

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: It starts up my Music app and starts playing through the phone speaker so I still have to go to settings and press the button to play via Bluetooth and then press another button to select the my car\'s Bluetooth, so it is really just saving me 1 button press which I don\'t even like since it starts blasting on my phone first. Upgraded my rating because of developer\'s attention to feedback. Can you add TUNEIN RADIO PRO also?
reviews.author: Me Yu
